metadata.title: CVE-2022-34568 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
SDL v1.2 was discovered to contain a use-after-free via the XFree functionat /src/video/x11/SDL_x11yuv.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-34568` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsdl1.2debian - 1.2.15+dfsg1-3ubuntu0.1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libsdl1.2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.15+dfsg1-3ubuntu0.1+esm2').
libsdl2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
